text.textblock: The following notice of meeting is published pursuant to Section 3(a) of the Government in the Sunshine Act (Pub. L. No. 94-409), U.S.C. 552b:

date.textblock: 825 North Capitol Street, N.E., Room 9306, Washington, DC 20426.
Items listed on the agenda may be deleted without further notice.
Lois D. Cashell, Secretary, Telephone (202) 208-0400. For a recording listing items stricken from or added to the meeting, call (202) 208-1627.

This is a list of matters to be considered by the Commission. It does not include a listing of all papers relevant to the items on the agenda; however, all public documents may be examined in the Reference and Information Center.
Project No. 8369-024, Village of Saranac Lake
Project No. 553-020, City of Seattle, Washington
Project No. 5223-021, International Falls Power Company
Project No. 2519-004, Central Maine Power Company
Docket No. ER93-985-000, New England Power Pool
